description: 本課程主要藉由主題人物探討全球教育創新議題,透過「創新分組」與「學習型團隊」,提升學生的創新協作能力,並在學期中和學期末以「語言劇場」同步引導英文程度不同的學生合作學習。課程將融入優質對話的體驗學習,整學期學生將在英文演說、敘說、說故事、簡報或新聞報導的學習,以「同步聽說」法和「全像多維」學習法不斷演練,從各自不同的程度快速提升英文聽說讀寫的整合運用能力。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Syllabus: English for Specific Purposes – Education 2018 Fall**

**Goal & Purpose:**

This class aims to prepare students for oral and written communication in general and professional contexts. We will discuss multiple education-related issues and students will be given plenty of opportunities to communicate and discuss issues in English. _Teacher lecture will be kept to minimum_. Students are expected to _ACTIVELY_ explore ideas, share, and talk about issues brought up in the class.

**Weekly Routine**

Before class:

*   Go to TED website (topics on Moodle) and watch the clips. Please download the transcript and study it **_before you do the following_**. Also bring it to the class.
*   _Select **two** below every week but make sure you have a **balanced selection** by the end of the term_: Due every Monday (for Thursday class) & Friday (for Monday class)

1.Write Key ideas

2.Quotes you love

3.Questions for the talk of the week – pertains to **_the meaning_** but not grammar or vocabulary

In class:

*   A group to lead discussion of the questions (no grammar and vocab): 20-25 min
*   To be _GRADED_ by your classmates

**Midterm:** TV News Report in Video \[3-5 min\]/Two per group – **Due 10/22**

Conducting interviews with different stakeholders on issues related to what we have discussed so far and turn it into a news report.

1\. First choose three topics we have covered in preparing for your interview questions. For example,

(1) Grade-based VS non-Grade-based schooling

(2) grit

(3) learning from failure, etc.

2\. Prepare 3 questions.

3\. Interview to get different perspectives from different people. For example,

(1) elementary kid

(2) parents

(3) teachers

(4) professors, etc.

\*\*You need to include 3 main components in the video:

(1) Introduction: Your interpretation of these topics/issues + sources (act out/personify/show quotes)

(2) Interview &

(3) Conclusion: Sums up your interview results.

**Final Project: Choose one; 3 per group; oral report for 10 min**

1\. Design and promote ways to better education or teaching and learning

*   Use sources in the class (must) and/or elsewhere (optional)
*   Set your topic
*   Use multimedia (images, video, graphic design, etc.) to complement your report
*   Use PPT
*   You may talk about: What is the problem that you see (_not_ limited to Taiwan), Why this has to be changed, and How this can be done.
*   A graphic design tool for your reference: [https://www.canva.com/](https://www.canva.com/)

2\. Tell a story of the company or school you hope to be working in.

*   Set your topic
*   Use multimedia (images, video, graphic design, etc.) to complement your story
*   Use PPT
*   You can create a story or report the cultural aspect. You may also delineate why it is a good match between you and the dreamed place. Avoid superficial reports containing merely _facts_.
*   A graphic design tool for your reference: [https://www.canva.com/](https://www.canva.com/)

3\. Important Dates:

*   : Bring what you have (almost done) to be polished and discuss with the teacher
*   : Due and oral report

\*\*You will report to 4-5 groups in the last class who will evaluate your performance. You will also evaluate your teammates’ performance.
